  • CORE
    SERVICES

    OAHU'S UNIQUE HIGH-HUMIDITY ENVIRONMENT AND SILENT SALT-AIR CORROSION DEMAND FAR MORE THAN OFF-THE-SHELF COOLING FOR THE DIVERSE MICRO-CLIMATES OF THE ISLANDS. FROM HIGH-EFFICIENCY WINDOW AC UNITS (LG & GE) CURATED FOR DURABILITY; ULTRA-QUIET DUCTLESS MINI SPLITS DESIGNED FOR PRECISION ZONE COOLING; CENTRAL AC RETROFITS ENGINEERED FOR TROPICAL ENERGY PERFORMANCE; AND SPECIALIZED WINDOW AC CLEANINGS THAT DEFEND AGAINST HAWAII'S RELENTLESS SALT-AIR HUMIDITY. WE OFFER PROVEN SOLUTIONS DESIGNED TO MAXIMIZE SYSTEM LIFESPAN, IMPROVE INDOOR AIR QUALITY, AND AGGRESSIVELY LOWER MONTHLY ENERGY COSTS FOR THE LONG TERM.

      MINI SPLITS

      Eliminate Hot Spots & High Bills. > Our ultra-quiet ductless mini splits provide targeted cooling for any size of rooms. Whether it’s a new Installation or a Retrofit for an older Oahu home, we offer full Service & Repairs to keep your sanctuary cool and quiet

      storefront

      WINDOW AC SHOP

      Your Local High-Efficiency Resource. Skip the big-box logistics. We stock premium, DIY high-efficiency LG & GE Through-the-Wall units specifically chosen for their durability. Get expert advice on the right BTU for your space and schedule your pick up your unit today at our Waipahu location.

      View Inventory arrow_forward
    • CENTRAL AC
      hvac

      CENTRAL AC

      Maximize Whole-Home Comfort. We provide professional Retrofits (Air Handlers & Condensers ONLY), SEER2 Efficiency Upgrades, and Full-Service, Maintenance and Repairs for  your Central AC system(s). Our professionals ensure your system is precisely tuned to handle Hawaii's humidity while lowering your monthly energy costs.

      MORE INFO arrow_forward
    • WINDOW AC CLEANING
      cleaning_services

      WINDOW AC CLEANING

      Breathe Cleaner, Save Longer. High humidity and salt air are the leading causes of AC failure in the islands. Our Deep Cleaning window ac cleaning services lead by Technician, Chris Martinez, ensuring to assist with protecting your investment, improve indoor air quality, and prevent expensive breakdowns before they happen.

      WINDOW AC MAINTENANCE arrow_forward
